column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love coming to jinya. Between take out and dining in
column2: I eat there at least once a week. The ramen is delicious
column3: especially the spicy chicken ramen and the shrimp tempura. Cannot recommend it enough. However
column5: I've had a lot of issues with my orders. The last time I dined in
column6: I was the only person sitting at the bar and my server forgot 3 different things with my order and it took me awhile to flag her down. The past 2 times I ordered to go
column7: it either didn't come with chicken for the chicken ramen or I asked for it spicy and it came regular. As much as I love this place and won't stop coming here
column8: it gets frustrating sometimes! I would recommend confirming your to go orders before leaving
